text: As a Computer Engineering student from Iran, I’m driven by a strong passion for front-end development and clean, purposeful UI design. I’ve worked with technologies like React.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, and I’m continuously exploring advanced concepts such as WebSocket and Next.js. My learning journey is deeply project-based, and I love transforming ideas into intuitive digital experiences that feel modern, fast, and reliable.
